cause.description:
this cause is made to shake out passionate people who care about conserving whales. whether you smile with teeth or baleen, these animals need bipedal friends, and of course big hugs!
if you can or not, HUG a whale, you know you want to!
1. whale populations are increasingly declining
2. a whale hug is an affirmative to caring
3. whales are cool and amazing mammals that can do cool things
cause.mission: promote awareness leading to support and conservation of these animals.
cause.name: hug a whale, you know you want to!
